==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Grounded Geoshroom will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Grounded Geoshroom can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Grounded Geoshroom is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Melee Combo
|desc_2      = Combos 2 melee strikes, dealing '''70% ATK''', '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, AoE increased, knockback increased, DMG increased to '''85% ATK''', '''100% ATK'''.
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Grounded Geoshroom Melee Combo 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Grounded Geoshroom Melee Combo 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Charge
|desc_3      = Charges towards the player, dealing '''30% ATK''', '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased, the Grounded Geoshroom may change its direction 3 times while continuing to charge.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, knockback increased, DMG increased to '''40% ATK''', '''100% ATK'''.
|caption_3   = Normal
|file_3_2    = Grounded Geoshroom Charge 2
|caption_3_2 = Activated
|file_3_3    = Grounded Geoshroom Charge 3
|caption_3_3 = Scorched

|name_4      = Head Slam
|desc_4      = Performs a front flip and smashes the ground with its head, dealing '''30% ATK''', '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, knockback increased, DMG increased to '''40% ATK''', '''100% ATK''', also produces a ring of explosions that deals '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}}.
|caption_4   = Normal
|file_4_2    = Grounded Geoshroom Head Slam 2
|caption_4_2 = Activated
|file_4_3    = Grounded Geoshroom Head Slam 3
|caption_4_3 = Scorched
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A mimetic life form made out of spores that has extreme adaptability.<br>This being has undergone almost complete keratinization due to the influence of Geo. When one considers that Fungi evolved from spores, perhaps this one might even be the foundation for a further evolution into some new life form altogether &mdash; if given time, that is.<br>This creature has a position of command amongst colonies of fungal beasts and exhibits heightened intelligence to match.|[[Archive]]}}
